name: Tiger Zinda Hai
description: Tiger Zinda Hai is a 2017 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film directed by Ali Abbas Zafar and produced by Aditya Chopra under Yash Raj Films.

name: Tiger 3
description: A 2023 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film directed by Maneesh Sharma and produced by Aditya Chopra under Yash Raj Films.

name: Pathaan
description: The film follows Pathaan, an exiled RAW agent, who works with ISI agent Rubina Mohsin, to take down Jim, a former RAW agent turned rogue.

name: War
description: War is a 2019 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film directed by Siddharth Anand and produced by Aditya Chopra under Yash Raj Films.

name: Inception
description: Inception is a 2010 science fiction action film written and directed by Christopher Nolan, about a thief who enters peopleâ€™s dreams and steals secrets.

name: The Godfather
description: The Godfather is a 1972 American crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola, focusing on the powerful crime family of Don Vito Corleone.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: Pulp Fiction is a 1994 American crime film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, known for its eclectic dialogue, nonlinear story structure

name: Interstellar
description: Interstellar (2014) is a science fiction epic directed by Christopher Nolan, exploring space travel, black holes, and the survival of humanity.

name: The Redemption
description: The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 drama film based on a Stephen King novella, about the friendship between two imprisoned men over decades.

name: The Dark Knight
description: The Dark Knight (2008) is a superhero film directed by Christopher Nolan, featuring Batman's fight against the Joker in Gotham City.

name: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump (1994) follows the life of a slow-witted but kindhearted man witnessing, historical events in the 20th century United States.

name: Fight Club
description: Fight Club is a 1999 film directed by David Fincher, about an insomniac office worker and a soap maker who form an underground fight club.

name: Gladiator
description: Gladiator (2000) is a historical drama film directed by Ridley Scott about a betrayed Roman general who seeks revenge as a gladiator.
